item.title: Monitoring my Blood Sugar as a Non-Diabetic
item.description: As I get older, I find myself continuing to optimize my health under the guidance of one core principle ‚Äî that most of the negativity I experience externally is caused by internal biological factors (poor sleep, blood sugar crash, nutrient deficiency, etc.) Earlier this year, I used a continuous glucose monitor for a month.
